text: Podlesnoye () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Podlesnensky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 376 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 21 km from Sterlitamak. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Podlesnoye, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
